text: This is the list of rulers of the Kara Koyunlu dynasty ("The Horde of the Black Sheep"). The dynasty ruled the territory now part of present-day Iran, Iraq, Azerbaijan and eastern Turkey. Their capital was the city of Tabriz. ==Kara Koyunlu rulers== {| width=100% class="wikitable" ! style="background- color:#F0DC82" width=9% | Titular Name ! style="background-color:#F0DC82" width=9% | Personal Name ! style="background-color:#F0DC82" width=9% | Reign |- |- style="background:yellow" |align="center"|Bey |align="center"|Bayram Khwaja |align="center"|1374 - 1378 C.E. | |- |- style="background:yellow" |align="center"|Bey |align="center"| Qara Muhammad Turemish (Nephew of Bairam Khwaja) |align="center"|1378 - 1388 C.E. | |- |align="center"|Bey Abu Nasr |align="center"| Qara Yusuf Nuyan ibn Qara Muhammad |align="center"|1388 - 1399 C.E. |- |colspan=4 align="center"| Amir Timur invades Kara Koyunlu (1400 - 1405 C.E.) |-C |align="center"|Bey Abu Nasr |align="center"| Qara Yusuf Nuyan ibn Qara Muhammad |align="center"|1405 - 1420 C.E. |- |align="center"|Bey |align="center"| Qara Iskander ibn Yusuf |align="center"|1420 - 1436 C.E. |- |align="center"|Bey |align="center"| Ispend bin Yusuf |align="center"|1420 - 1445 C.E. |- |align="center"| Bey Muzaffar-al-Din |align="center"| Jahan Shah ibn Yusuf |align="center"|1436 - 1467 C.E. |- |align="center"|Bey |align="center"| Hasan Ali ibn Jahan Shah |align="center"| 1467 - 1468 C.E. |- |colspan=4 align="center"| Conquest by Aq Qoyunlu. |} *Yellow Shaded row signifies Progenitor of Kara Koyunlu dynasty. title: List of rulers of Kara Koyunlu
